summary: The sprint planning architect clarified a misunderstanding about the backlog status, confirming all stories are in backlog with no development started, and proposed Sprint SP-001 to implement mock login (US-010), add employee profile (US-015), and employee directory search (US-001) as the foundational MVP features.

actions.task: Review and approve or tweak the proposed Sprint SP-001, including stories US-010, US-015, and US-001
Save the sprint and update story statuses to 'In Sprint' once approved

risks.risk: Supabase database not seeded, potentially blocking data insertion and testing
risks.mitigation: Perform quick manual insert or include US-016 (setup script) in a subsequent sprint
